member.name: IInitializeCommand.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize objects that share an implementation of , or with the application-specified command name and its registered properties.
member.param: Pointer to a string that contains the command name (the name of the command key as found in the registry). For instance, if the command is registered under ...\shell\MyCommand, pszCommandName points to "MyCommand".
Pointer to an instance that can be used to read the properties related to the command in the registry. For example, a command may registry a string property under its ...\shell\MyCommand subkey.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeCommand
member.summary: Exposes a single method used to initialize objects that implement , or with the application-specified command name and its registered properties.
